headline: Kamala’s Interview Was Really Bad, But A Body Language Expert Reveals It Was Even Worse [VIDEO]
author: Red Voice Media
sentences: Speaking on Newsmax, Gregory Hartley, a behavior and body language expert, analyzed the interview with Harris and pointed out how not only are her answers already determined, but everything down to her hand movements are all a way to deflect the questions being asked and make it appear the Biden administration is still in control of situations like COVID-19.
